trans:
With truely exclusive activities on Wednesday 30 October 204 at EightEight Studio Rama XI.
ðŸ’š Can try your luck by participating in following activities:
ðŸ›Only buy any Baby Bright shower cream and body skin care products valued 399 baht and more/receipt. Try your luck to be the winner with LUCKY DRAW 30 persons, join live event, and truly exclusive activities with Nong Anda Ananda.
Get the right to join the event as following:
1. Get the right to join the event (Seats following order)
2. Get the Poster (wet signature)
3. PHOTO GROUP 1:6 with Nong Anda, digital camera 1 SHOT (by the team)
4. Join activities with the presenter and try your luck to get prizes.
(*Lucky persons can bring prizes to give to the presenter with yourself in the event.)
Period of joining the activities and send the receipts from October 11, 2024 - October 23, 2024 (midnight).
Upload receipt to get the right at Google Form
Follow the determined link > forms.gle/ENsii7k8xmDqdJ...
